resources.string: All loyal customers deserve to get rewarded for every dollar they spend. You can now earn gold points and discounts without coupons or cards for every purchase you make. Get a full store experience instead of just buying products. PLP helps small businesses create their own powerful rewards program integrated with their point of sales terminals in order to incentivize user behavior and drive business success. Scan your unique QRCode on your phone at the point of sale terminal and earn gold points at all participating small businesses. PLP has been designed to give both the stores and customers a truly engaging experience. It allows the customer to immediately start earning store gold points that can be redeemed or used as cash to purchase store products.
